Class JenaConversionUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.sindice.rdfcommons.jena.JenaConversionUtil

public class JenaConversionUtil
extends Object

Utility functions to convert data from jena domain to sindice.rdfcommons domain.

Michele Mostarda ( mostarda@fbk.eu )
